originalText.text: Upon my in - person consult with Dr Woolrich , she was friendly , knowledgeable and caring . She offered  a most comprehensive exam, asking lots of pertinent questions , made suggestions and took a holistic approach . I was very impressed and we scheduled a colonoscopy. Her office space was hygienic and staff friendly and competent . I would highly recommend Dr Woolrich . Dr Woolrich also displayed a healthy sense of humor , which is always welcome from any health care practitioner.

originalText.text:
Once again, Doc Audrey Woolrich impresses me with her detailed way of dealing with an ailment. If there were 100 stars, she would receive them  all. I continue to be thankful. I see in my first review below, I neglected to mention her bedside manner.... she is personable, caring and again, feel fortunate to have her as my Doc.

Dr. Audrey Woolrich is an excellent Doctor. Her effort and ability to diagnose is unsurpassed.  She is kind hearted and full of integrity. Doc Woolrich clearly loves her position and in manifests in every way.  Am so very thankful for being her patient

originalText.text: Dr. Woolrich is thorough, knowledgeable, dedicated. When you are with her, you are in great hands. She makes herself available for questions…even off hours and is quick to respond. She is an amazing doctor! The go is is that she is quite personable, as well!

text.text: Dr. Woolrich is thorough, knowledgeable, dedicated. When you are with her, you are in great hands. She makes herself available for questions…even off hours and is quick to respond. She is an amazing doctor! The go is is that she is quite personable, as well!

originalText.text: Dr. Woolrich is holistic in care of her patients and hears their concerns. She provides effective solutions to  problems and explains matters clearly in a reassuring, caring manner. I have and continue to recommend her to others without reservation.

originalText.text: Dr. Woolrich is an excellent doctor! She is the most thorough doctor  in taking a patient's history that I have ever been to. She is a new doctor for me but I am very happy to have found her! I would definitely recommend Dr. Woolrich!
